item.title: Jussie Smollett Returns to Fox as Part of ‘Special Forces’ Cast
item.description: Olympic gold medalist Shawn Johnson East, ‘Real Housewife’ Teresa Giudice and ‘Sisters Wives’ star Kody Brown are also taking part in the competition series.

item.title: Jussie Smollett Speaks in Netflix Doc ‘The Truth About Jussie Smollett?’
item.description: The actor sat down to be interviewed for a 90-minute feature from the ‘Tinder Swindler’ team that promises new evidence and competing narratives in a zoomed out look.
